title: Need Mid and Support for a serious ranked 5s team
body:
Would you like to join a stable ranked 5s team who is willing to work together to get through the growing pains? Do you want to play on a team that's going to join tournaments and leagues against players who are at your skill level or higher? Look no further then. Perfect Insanity is looking for two dedicated summoners willing to fit this agenda, if that sounds like you feel free to add me on league at the ign: PI Stephen

Age:
Role: 
Champ Pool:
Weaknesses:
Strengths:
Curse Voice:

replies.body:
Age: 17
Role: Mid
Champ Pool: Ahri, Syndra, Jayce, Talon, Orianna, Fizz, Zed, willing to work on others
Weaknesses: Can be a bit aggressive in laning phase, not the best shotcaller but working on it
Strengths: Roam, ward coverage, farming, willing to work on champions that the manager/captain would like me to play
Curse Voice: Yes

Age: 26
Role: Mid or Support either one
Champ Pool: {{champion:30}}{{champion:112}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:9}}  {{champion:1}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:412}} 
Weaknesses: I'm really bad at being too greedy for kills, especially after I blew a summoners or ult to try to get it already and failed.
Strengths: I'm really good at itemization, I don't always build the same thing in the same order every game, I switch it up based on the current game and what I actually need and what the team needs.
Curse Voice: Yes.

Age:26
Role:mid
Champ Pool:vel, ori, xer, anivia, veig, karth, lux
Weaknesses:I don't like to play assassins
Strengths:I've won over 10 tournaments as a mid laner, i always have high cs and low deaths
Curse Voice:yes

Age: 17
Role: Mid
Champ Pool: Zed, Ahri, Xerath, LeBlanc, Fizz, Syndra, Jayce, Brand, Annie, Orianna, Talon
Weaknesses: I play poorly when camped by a jungler
Strengths: Great laning, farm, roaming, hyper aggressive plays, shotcalling, team synergy.
Curse Voice: Have CV

Age: 20
Role: Mid
Champ Pool: {{champion:103}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:127}} 
Weaknesses: aggressive playstyle
Strengths: aggressive playstyle  :)
Curse Voice:

Age: 22
Role: Support
Champ Pool: Janna, Soraka, Sona, Nami (Main Janna)
Weaknesses: I sometimes misclick with spells. (getting a better mouse)
Strengths: Always ward and work well with my adc.
Curse Voice: I have CV.

Age: 20
Role: Mid
Champ Pool: Kat, Leblanc, Akali, Annie, Orianna, Brand
Weaknesses: not the best shot caller still working on it.
Strengths: Strong lane, buy wards and gank for my lanes 
Curse Voice: i have CV and a working mic

Age:25
Role: Support
Champ Pool: 10 champs short of all champs but all supports and adcs 
Weaknesses: idk check me out and tell me what u think mu weakness would be
Strengths: Ward Coverage, common sense , good at keeping track of timers and good map awareness , Good minion preping 
Curse Voice:yea

Age:20


Role:Support


Champ Pool: Thresh, Janna, Nami, Braum, Soraka


Weaknesses: Sometimes over aggressive in lane.


Strengths: Vision control, objective control, teamfighting.


Curse Voice: Yes

Age: 16

Role: Mid
Champ Pool: Zed (main), Orianna, Fizz, Malzahar, Jayce, LeBlanc, Hecarim, Malphite, Xerath, Katarina, Ziggs, Lulu, Yasuo

Weaknesses: Sometimes forget to buy wards out of lane phase, Miscalculating damage sometimes

Strengths: Decent mechanics and decision making (most of the time) When I remember to buy wards I know where to put them :3, I don't rage easily, and I'm willing to listen to others imput to improve.

Curse Voice: Don't have one but I could get it

Age: 20
Role: Support
Champ Pool: Top 3 Champs: Thresh, Leona, Nami ( Can play all support champs well )
Weaknesses: Greediness, and also sometimes tunnel vision 
Strengths: Shot calling, ward placement, laneing mechanics
Curse Voice: Yes
